attributes.action: do everything in his power to ensure the safe release of Israel’s missing soldiers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just as the Prime Minister did everything in his power to ensure the safe release of the 15 British sailors from Iran, we implore the Prime Minister to do the same with the 8 Israeli soldiers that that are missing in action. Zachary Baumel, Yehuda Katz, Zvi Feldman (captured in 1982), Ron Arad, (captured in 1986) Guy Hever (Missing since 1997), Gilad Shalit, Ehud Goldwasser and Eldad Regev (captured 2006). 
The release of these soldiers will be a great step in insuring a lasing peace in the Middle East.
